name: Christopher J. FORD, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Ford v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Christopher J. FORD, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
54 A.3d 11
Christopher J. FORD, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania, Respondents.
No. 114 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 2012.
